DataElement.preferredName: Biospecimen Unit of Quantity Data Source Data Value Unit of Measure
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Any material sample taken from a biological entity for testing, diagnostic, propagation, treatment or research purposes, including a sample obtained from a living organism or taken from the biological object after halting of all its life functions. Biospecimen can contain one or more components including but not limited to cellular molecules, cells, tissues, organs, body fluids, embryos, and body excretory products.:An indication of the type of unit of measure being used to express a quantity._The person or authoritative body who provided the information._The information contained in a data field. It may represent a numeric quantity, a textual characterization, a date or time measurement, or some other state, depending on the nature of the attribute.:Any material sample taken from a biological entity for testing, diagnostic, propagation, treatment or research purposes, including a sample obtained from a living organism or taken from the biological object after halting of all its life functions. Biospecimen can contain one or more components including but not limited to cellular molecules, cells, tissues, organs, body fluids, embryos, and body excretory products._An indication of the type of unit of measure being used to express a quantity._A named quantity in terms of which other quantities are measured or specified, used as a standard measurement of like kinds.
